author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: ای ارض طاء حال هم از فضل الهی محلّ و مقرّ دوستان حقّی
translation: Among them is Our own sister, whom We now call to mind as a token of Our fidelity, and as proof of Our loving-kindness, unto her. How piteous was her plight! In what a state of resignation she returned to her God! We, alone, in Our all-encompassing knowledge, have known it.
